name: EQ Parametric
description: This algorithm is a multi-channel, multi-band, parametric EQ. Each channel can process a number of busses - you might typically have a channel processing one or two busses for a mono or stereo signal, but you could, say, process all 12 of the inputs with the same EQ settings by using a single channel with a width of 12.

parameters.name: Q
parameters.description: Sets the EQ band ‘Q’ or resonance. Note that some EQ types do not use this parameter.

parameters.name: Gain
parameters.description: Sets the EQ band gain. Note that some EQ types do not use this parameter.

input_ports.name: Input
input_ports.description: The first input bus to process.

output_ports.name: Output
output_ports.description: The first output bus. If set to ‘None’, the input bus is used as output, and the mode is always ‘Replace’.
